name: Tiny Top Collection: Puffies
description:
Part three of a LoRA set dedicated to small breasted women. Puffy nipples come on all breast sizes, but this set is specially trained on small boobs.

Unfortunately SD tends to generate small breasts that are bigger than in the training pictures. So I included a set of flat chested women in the training images to reduce the average size.

Trigger words are not strictly necesseary but you can use them to change the balance between the flat and the puffy parts of the training set. The generated breast size also strongly depends on the rest of the prompt. Use the trigger words for fine tuning.

tt_puffy emphasizes the original training set, tt_flat does the opposite. They don't necessarily make the breasts bigger or smaller, but they do influence the shape or help to make the nipples look realistic. Play around with them.

Standard disclaimer: This model was trained on pictures of white women with epiCRealism. Other ethnicities may follow in the future. Prompts for the sample images are as simple as possible to show what the model is capable of doing without a lot of tweaking. If you like it, I'd be happy to see more extravagant creations.

meta.prompt: frontal upper body  photo of a nude happy 20  yo tattooed woman with thick ginger blonde braids a wheat field, blue sky, detailed skin texture<lora:tt_puffy:0.75>
diagonal view upper body  photo of a happy tanned nude tt_puffy 20 yo woman standing on a tropical beach, sunny sky, detailed skin texture  <lora:tt_puffy:0.8>

diagonal view upper body  photo of a pale nude chubby 30 yo tattooed (tt_puffy) punk woman with very short shaved red hair standing at the edge of a bed with a serious look, detailed skin texture<lora:tt_puffy:0.5>
